summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Moresoo 18inch Tape in Hair Extensions Human Hair Blonde Hair Real Human Hair 20pcs 50g Remy Human Hair Extensions Tape on Balayage #6 Brown to Blonde #60 Glue on Hair Seamless Skin Weft Hair
Review Date: 2018/08/18
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 5 x 1.89 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '711931080862'}
Review Text: Love love love this company love the hair. I use a little bit of blonde shampoo to keep the color nice and bright. Love it. Ive been doing extensions for nearly 12 years and these are some of the best in this price point.
Review Title: Amaaaaazing hairr omgg
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Full Shine 18" Tape in Remy Human Hair Extensions Tape Ombre Extensions Dip Dyed Color #8 Ash Brown Fading to #60 and #18 Ash Blonde Highlighted Extensions 20 Pcs 50gram Per Package
Review Date: 2019/03/26
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 5 x 2 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '734602042013'}
Review Text: This color is very hard to find. Very blendable and soft. I would def recommend two or three packs for a full head of extensions.
Review Title: Color is perfect
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: VeSunny 20" Remy Keratin Tip Hair Extensions Blonde Human Hair 1G/S #60 Platinum Blonde Pre Bonded Flat Tip Human Hair Extensions 50 Strands
Review Date: 2019/04/28
Store: Ve Sunny
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ve Sunny', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Fusion', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '20 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '798863458884'}
Review Text: Love this hair. It does require some additional toning if ur looking for that icy blonde color. And requires deep conditioning but I love this hair. Great for someone looking for some added length and thickness
Review Title: Love these
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: VeSunny 16inch #4 Dark Brown Remy Tape in Hair Extensions Human Hair 20pcs 100% Remy Tape in Hair Extensions 50g Per Pack 20pcs
Review Date: 2019/08/08
Store: Ve Sunny
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ve Sunny', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '16 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '16 x 1 x 1 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '799577978088'}
Review Text: Beautiful hair. Great quality. It does shed a lot but stays in well for about five to six weeks. Great for a temporary longer thicker look. Would highly recommend.
Review Title: Great hair
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sunny 40pcs 100g 16inch Tape in Colored Hair Extensions Dark Brown Fade to Honey Blonde Balayage Double Weft Tape in Hair Extensions Real Human Hair
Review Date: 2019/08/08
Store: Sunny Beauty
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sunny Beauty', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '16 x 1 x 1 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'UPC': '639631413158'}
Review Text: My clients love this hair. The downfall is that is does shed but even extensions twice as much $$ shed. They do get dry so I would recommend using a leave in conditioner on them. I do re-tape them with babe tape for extra hold. These are re.usable if properly cared for. The color is very blend-able and natural.
Review Title: Love this hair.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nicole Miller 2 Pack (30 Count Each) Charcoal and Rosehip Facial Cleansing and Make Up Remover Wipes
Review Date: 2019/11/15
Store: Nicole Miller
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Nicole Miller', 'Skin Type': 'acne prone', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Item Form': 'Wipes', 'Package Type': 'Pouch', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 4.17 x 3.54 inches; 1.11 Pounds', 'UPC': '192598163615'}
Review Text: Wasn’t a huge fan of these, they look cool but that’s about it. The wipes themselves don’t have much moisture on them so u need to use three or four of them. Plus with the cloth being black u cannot see if all your makeup is fully removed
Review Title: Would Not Recommend
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Purchase Patterns:**

- **Hair Extensions Focus:** Strong preference for human hair extensions, particularly tape-in and fusion types.
- **Length Preference:** Frequent purchases in 16-20 inches, indicating a desire for significant length and volume.
- **Color Trends:** A consistent interest in blonde shades (platinum, balayage) and a variety of ombre styles.
- **Quality Emphasis:** Repeated emphasis on high-quality textures and blendability, with a tendency to seek affordable options without sacrificing quality.
- **Maintenance Awareness:** Purchaser acknowledges maintenance needs (toning, conditioning) for desired color durability and extension longevity.
- **Application Methods:** Favoring tape-in and keratin tip (fusion) installation methods, signaling a preference for convenience and reusability.
- **Mixed Review on Other Products:** Indifferent to lower-rated beauty products (e.g., makeup remover wipes) suggests focused investment primarily in hair-related purchases.
- **Reliability Demand:** Reviews reflect a desire for extensions that maintain quality over time, with an understanding of product limitations like shedding.

Overall, the individual displays a clear commitment to hair enhancement products, particularly human hair extensions, appreciating both aesthetic and quality, while being mindful of care and maintenance.

target_interaction.title: Bugs in packaging
target_interaction.text: There were dead bugs in my hair when I opened it today. Like inside next to the beads. I feel very weirded out rn
target_interaction.title_meta: Moresoo 20 Inch Micro Link Hair Extensions Remy Human Hair Extensions Color #60 Platinum Blonde Micro Ring Loop Human Hair Extensions Blonde Hair Extensions 50G/50S…
